name: 1st-Order RC High-Pass Filter
description: Passive first-order RC high-pass filter. Passes frequencies above the cutoff and attenuates lower frequencies at +20 dB/decade.
design_equations: At f_c the gain is -3 dB and phase is +45 degrees
netlist:
* 1st-Order RC High-Pass Filter
.param R1=10k
.param C1=10n
V1 in 0 dc 0 ac 1
C1 in mid {C1}
R1 mid 0 {R1}
R2 mid out 0.001
C2 out 0 1T
